ygData.subject: Editor Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, is there a way I can use the editor to shrink the size of an existing scenario? One more thing, inspiration for my next scenario is gone but I know what

Ok, is there a way I can use the editor to shrink the size of an 
existing scenario?

One more thing, inspiration for my next scenario is gone but I know 
what the following scenarios should look like.

The good news (if it could be considered good news) is that when that 
scenario is finished, a lot of you might be complaining about one 
specific item about it.  No, it will not be overwhelmingly outnumbered 
against super strong opponents.
